line.comment: * Sun 23 can cause the game to crash
* 1 & 2 = Debris (type 1 is too big and is easily confused with a real asteroid).
* Get an array of all gates in the game

sval.val: Sun 23 can cause the game to crash
1 & 2 = Debris (type 1 is too big and is easily confused with a real asteroid).
Get an array of all gates in the game
